Containers.Name: Unraid DVB
Containers.Description:
This plugin from LinuxServer.io allows you to easily install a modified Unraid version with DVB drivers compiled. Remember to add --device=/dev/dvb to the extra parameters in the MythTV/TVHeadEnd docker.
Once installed you can then use the MythTV Docker or a TVHeadEnd docker/plugin to use Unraid as a PVR backend.
